sqlMap.select: select ID as id, C_TYPEID as typeid, C_FLIGHTTYPE as flighttype, C_USERTYPE as usertype, C_STARTCITY as startcity, C_ENDCITY as endcity, C_NUMBERPEOPLE as numberpeople, C_CA as ca, C_FLIGHTNUMBER as flightnumber, C_STARTTIME as starttime, C_CREATEUSER as createuser, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_STATUS as status, C_CHENGREN as chengren, C_ERTONG as ertong, C_YINGER as yinger, C_COMMENT as comment from T_TEAMAPPLY where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_TEAMAPPLY ( ID, C_TYPEID, C_FLIGHTTYPE, C_USERTYPE, C_STARTCITY, C_ENDCITY, C_NUMBERPEOPLE, C_CA, C_FLIGHTNUMBER, C_STARTTIME, C_CREATEUSER, C_CREATETIME, C_STATUS, C_CHENGREN, C_ERTONG, C_YINGER, C_COMMENT ) values (
#id#,
#typeid:DECIMAL#,
#flighttype:DECIMAL#,
#usertype:DECIMAL#,
#startcity:DECIMAL#,
#endcity:DECIMAL#,
#numberpeople:DECIMAL#,
#ca#,
#flightnumber#,
#starttime#,
#createuser#,
#createtime#,
#status:DECIMAL#,
#chengren:DECIMAL#,
#ertong:DECIMAL#,
#yinger:DECIMAL#,
#comment#
)
sqlMap.update:
update T_TEAMAPPLY set C_TYPEID = #typeid:DECIMAL#, C_FLIGHTTYPE = #flighttype:DECIMAL#, C_USERTYPE = #usertype:DECIMAL#, C_STARTCITY = #startcity#, C_ENDCITY = #endcity#, C_NUMBERPEOPLE = #numberpeople:DECIMAL#, C_CA = #ca#, C_FLIGHTNUMBER = #flightnumber#, C_STARTTIME = #starttime#, C_CREATEUSER = #createuser#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_STATUS = #status:DECIMAL#, C_CHENGREN = #chengren:DECIMAL#, C_ERTONG = #ertong:DECIMAL#, C_YINGER = #yinger:DECIMAL#, C_COMMENT = #comment#
where ID = #id#
